response.overview: As David’s funds begin to diminish his poor living situation mirrors his poor treatment of others. Although he may appear to be put together at first glance, he is slowly falling apart grasping to this untrue ‘wealthy image’. People are reported missing as a metaphor for the number of homeless people who ‘disappearing’ from society, showing how easily the housing crisis can affect others and how society treats those in need. They disregard and treat them as though they’re invisible.
response.tagline: The number of forgotten people within our society are always rising but do you notice?
response.title: Who’s Next
